name: Tetrash: A Garbage Game
description:
Recycling in Portland is a challenge: there are lots of bins and lots of rules, and doing it wrong is sure to earn you disgust and mockery from your friends. Put that coffee cup in the recycle bin? Sorry friend, you're not getting a second date.

Fortunately, finally, a game has come along that lets you practice sorting your garbage in the privacy of your own browser. Play a few rounds of Tetrash and you'll have all the knowledge you need to totally own the next eco-noob who dares to cross your perfectly sorted path.
